title: PBE NOT WORKING
body: Whenever I join a queue and everyone selects their champs it always acts as if someone dodges. It happened for 2 hours straight. is it down for maintenance or what?

replies.body: If you're able to get into champion select, the servers aren't down for maintenance. It sounds like you've just been unlucky with people dodging lately.
im trying to go in the pbe  server and i cant login. it say your password or username is not correct. pls help me
